<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_cs_base_ext.AccountManagerRelationshipUtilSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AccountManagerRelationshipUtilSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AccountManagerRelationshipUtilSNC = Class.create();
AccountManagerRelationshipUtilSNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    hasAccessTo: function(accountID) {
        if (gs.nil(accountID))
            return false;
        return this._isAccountManagerOf(accountID);
    },

    hasAccessToWithSysIdTable: function(record_sys_id, table_name) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(table_name);
        var found = gr.get(record_sys_id);
        if (found)
            return this.hasAccessTo(gr.account);
        return false;
    },

    _isAccountManagerOf: function(accountID) {
        var accountUserReln = new GlideRecord("sn_customerservice_team_member");
        accountUserReln.addQuery("account", accountID);
        accountUserReln.addQuery("user", gs.getUserID());
        accountUserReln.addQuery("responsibility", "b2d87bedb3730010700b4d43c6a8dca8");
        accountUserReln.query();
        return accountUserReln.hasNext();
    },

    isAnyAccountManager: function() {
        var accountUserReln = new GlideRecord("sn_customerservice_team_member");
        accountUserReln.addQuery("user", gs.getUserID());
        accountUserReln.addQuery("responsibility", "b2d87bedb3730010700b4d43c6a8dca8");
        accountUserReln.query();
        return accountUserReln.hasNext();
    },

    getAccessibleAccountsQuery: function(user) {
        var encodedQuery = '';
        var accountUserReln = new GlideRecord("sn_customerservice_team_member");
        accountUserReln.addQuery("user", user);
        accountUserReln.addQuery("responsibility", "b2d87bedb3730010700b4d43c6a8dca8");
        accountUserReln.query();
        while (accountUserReln.next()) {
            var accountQuery = 'account=' + accountUserReln.account + '';
            encodedQuery += gs.nil(encodedQuery) ? accountQuery : '^OR' + accountQuery;
        }
        return encodedQuery;
    },

    getAccessibleAccounts: function() {
        var accounts = [];
        var accountUserReln = new GlideRecord("sn_customerservice_team_member");
        accountUserReln.addQuery("user", gs.getUserID());
        accountUserReln.addQuery("responsibility", "b2d87bedb3730010700b4d43c6a8dca8");
        accountUserReln.query();
        while (accountUserReln.next()) {
            accounts.push(String(accountUserReln.account));
        }
        return accounts;
    },

    type: ' AccountManagerRelationshipUtilSNC'
};]]></script>
